title: Method Mwanjali
text:
Method Mwanjali (born 25 April 1983 in <a href="Hwange">Hwange</a>) is a <a href="Zimbabwe">Zimbabwe</a>an <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who plays as a <a href="defender%20%28football%29">defender</a> for <a href="Simba%20Sport%20Club%20">Simba Sport Club </a> in the <a href="Tanzania%20">Tanzania </a> <a href="Premier%20Soccer%20League">Premier Soccer League</a>. He previously played for <a href="Mamelodi%20Sundowns">Mamelodi Sundowns</a> in South Africa, Mpumhalanga Aces , <a href="CAPS%20United">CAPS United</a>, <a href="Shabanie%20Mine">Shabanie Mine</a> and <a href="Hwange%20FC">Hwange FC</a> in Zimbabwe.
He also played for the <a href="Zimbabwe%20national%20football%20team">Zimbabwean national team</a>.
